1.value: Propose determination of objectives, hypothesis and statement of research issue
Illustrate the factors determine the research problem addressed
Construct the nature of the problem
Distinguish critical appraisal of literature to identify gaps in knowledge to refine research topic
Interpret cause effective research problem, research design, adequate data analysis, relevant methodologies, reliability and validity of data and interpretation of results
Employ Literature survey using Google, Scifinder Scholar and Literature from other Libraries
Analyze the data, interpreting data, Evaluating the research output
Construct specific, measurable attainable, time bound, unequivocal, logical research thrust area
Understand the funding agencies, evaluate the related research organisation according to the thrust areas
